title: DORA | DORA Quick Check
content: Take the DORA Quick Check Measure your team’s software delivery performance in less than a minute! Compare it to the rest of the industry by responding to four multiple-choice questions. Compare your team’s performance to others, and discover which capabilities you should focus on improving. We don’t store your answers or personal information.

headings: H1: Take the DORA Quick Check
H5: Question 3 of 4: Change fail percentage
H5: Question 4 of 4: Failed deployment recovery time
metadata.description: DORA is a long running research program that seeks to understand the capabilities that drive software delivery and operations performance. DORA helps teams apply those capabilities, leading to better organizational performance.
metadata.keywords: DevOps, Lead time, Deploy frequency, Change fail rate, MTTR, Time to restore, metrics, DORA
